    There’s a horizontal rule below this.

    Here is an unordered list:

    • Item foo
    • Item bar
    • Item baz
    • Item zip

    And an ordered list:

    1. Item one
    2. Item two
    3. Item three
    4. Item four

    And a nested list:

    • level 1 item
      • level 2 item
      • level 2 item
        • level 3 item
        • level 3 item
    • level 1 item
      • level 2 item
      • level 2 item
      • level 2 item
    • level 1 item
      • level 2 item
      • level 2 item
